name: inclusiveread
description: AI-Powered Cognitive Bridge for Public Web Services

scripts.build:pdf: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='node_modules/pdfjs-dist/build';const dest='lib';if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest);fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,'pdf.mjs'),path.join(dest,'pdf.mjs'));fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,'pdf.worker.mjs'),path.join(dest,'pdf.worker.mjs'));console.log('PDF.js files copied to lib/');"
